name: RemoveConnectorFromBoard
description:
Remove a specific connector from the board using Miro API.

Use this tool to delete a specified connector from a Miro board. It is necessary to have the required 'boards:write' scope to perform this action. Useful when managing or updating board elements.

parameters.name: board_id_for_connector_removal
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the board from which you want to delete the connector.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the connector.

parameters.name: connector_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the connector to be deleted.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the connector that you want to delete.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the connector.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the connector.

parameters.name: connector_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the connector that you want to delete.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the connector that you want to delete.
